title: Living
writer: Kazuo Ishiguro, Akira Kurosawa, Shinobu Hashimoto
actors: Bill Nighy, Aimee Lou Wood, Alex Sharp
plot: In 1950s London, a humorless bureaucrat decides to take time off work to experience life after receiving a grim diagnosis.
country: United Kingdom, Japan, Sweden, Belgium, Finland
awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. 10 wins & 49 nominations total
